name: part_004
file: tmp_【 告知あり 】沙花叉アニソンフェス開催！2周年もありがとう！#沙花叉アニソンフェス 【沙花叉クロヱ⧸ホロライブ】 [E8HL1I2C_ZQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Sugar Song to Bitter Step' by Sakamata Chloe, Shirogane Noel, and Houshou Marine.
Performance of the song 'Chase the world' by May'n and Sakamata Chloe.

subtitles.original: 狂っておちてコースター 揺さぶられながら
subtitles.english: Going crazy and falling off the coaster while being shaken

subtitles.original: 見失えないものは何だ？
subtitles.english: What is it that I cannot lose sight of?

subtitles.original: 平等性原理主義の概念に呑まれて
subtitles.english: Swallowed by the concept of egalitarian fundamentalism

subtitles.original: 心までがまるでエトセトラ
subtitles.english: Even my heart is just an "et cetera"

subtitles.original: 大嫌い 大好き ちゃんと喋らなきゃ
subtitles.english: Hate it, love it, I've got to speak up properly

subtitles.original: 人形とさして変わらないし
subtitles.english: Otherwise I'm not much different from a doll

subtitles.original: あぁ 宵街を行く人だかりは
subtitles.english: Ah, the crowds moving through the evening streets

subtitles.original: 嬉しそうだったり 寂しそうだったり
subtitles.english: Look happy, look lonely

subtitles.original: コントラストが五線を飛びまわり
subtitles.english: The contrast flies around the staff

subtitles.original: 歌とリズムになる
subtitles.english: Becoming song and rhythm

subtitles.original: ママレード＆シュガーソング、ピーナッツ＆ビターステップ
subtitles.english: Marmalade & Sugar Song, Peanuts & Bitter Step

subtitles.original: 甘くて苦くて目が回りそうです
subtitles.english: It's sweet and bitter, it makes my head spin

subtitles.original: 南南西を目指してパーティを続けよう
subtitles.english: Let's head south-southwest and keep the party going

subtitles.original: 世界中を驚かせてしまう夜になる
subtitles.english: It'll be a night that surprises the whole world

subtitles.original: I feel 上々 連鎖になってリフレクト
subtitles.english: I feel great, becoming a chain and reflecting

subtitles.original: 蓋然性合理主義の正義に呑まれて
subtitles.english: Swallowed by the justice of probabilistic rationalism

subtitles.original: 僕らの音楽は道具になりさがる
subtitles.english: Our music degenerates into a tool

subtitles.original: こっちを向いてよ 背を向けないでよ
subtitles.english: Look this way, don't turn your back on me

subtitles.original: それは正論にならないけど
subtitles.english: That doesn't make it the right thing to say

subtitles.original: 祭囃子のその後で 高ぶったままの人
subtitles.english: After the festival music, those who are still excited

subtitles.original: 泣き出し出してしまう人
subtitles.english: Those who burst into tears

subtitles.original: 多分同じだけど 言葉にしようものなら
subtitles.english: They're probably the same, but if I were to put it into words

subtitles.original: 稚拙なものばかり
subtitles.english: It would be nothing but childish things

subtitles.original: 最高だってシュガーソング、幸せってビターステップ
subtitles.english: Sugar Song is the best, Bitter Step is happiness

subtitles.original: 死ねない理由をそこに映し出せ
subtitles.english: Reflect the reason you can't die right there

subtitles.original: 惜しがったって等速で明日は来ちゃうけど
subtitles.english: Even if you regret it, tomorrow will come at the same speed

subtitles.original: 脳内天国お花畑のアップデートを果たしたのなら
subtitles.english: If you've updated the flower garden in your head

subtitles.original: someday 狂騒が息を潜めても
subtitles.english: Someday, even if the frenzy catches its breath

subtitles.original: someday 正論に意味がなくなっても
subtitles.english: Someday, even if the right argument loses its meaning

subtitles.original: feeling 探すまで 鳴らし続けることだけが
subtitles.english: Feeling, until we find it, just continuing to ring

subtitles.original: 僕たちを僕たちたらしめる証明になる Q.E.D.
subtitles.english: Will be the proof that makes us who we are. Q.E.D.

subtitles.original: ママレード＆シュガーソング、ピーナッツ＆ビターステップ
subtitles.english: Marmalade & Sugar Song, Peanuts & Bitter Step

subtitles.original: 生きてく理由をそこに映し出せ
subtitles.english: Reflect the reason you live right there

subtitles.original: 北北東は後退り その距離が誇らしい
subtitles.english: Backing away from the north-northeast, proud of that distance

subtitles.original: 世界中を驚かせ続けよう
subtitles.english: Let's keep surprising the whole world

subtitles.english: Marmalade & Sugar Song, Peanuts & Bitter Step

subtitles.english: It's sweet and bitter, it makes my head spin

subtitles.english: Let's head south-southwest and keep the party going

subtitles.english: It'll be a night that surprises the whole world

subtitles.original: I feel 上々 連鎖になってリフレクト
subtitles.english: I feel great, becoming a chain and reflecting

subtitles.original: Goes on 一回だって、いつだって、また一興
subtitles.english: Goes on, even once, anytime, it's a blast again

subtitles.original: 一回だって、いつだって、また一興
subtitles.english: Even once, anytime, it's a blast again

subtitles.original: nananana... you got the heart base in the melody
subtitles.english: nananana... you got the heart base in the melody

subtitles.original: この瞳は 鮮やかに 今 君しか映さない
subtitles.english: These eyes clearly reflect only you now

subtitles.original: 踏み込んで目覚める 世界へ
subtitles.english: Stepping into the awakening world

subtitles.original: Chase the world
subtitles.english: Chase the world

subtitles.original: 俯きすぎて 小さい地平
subtitles.english: Looking down too much, a small horizon

subtitles.original: 僕だけの景色が
subtitles.english: The scenery only for me

subtitles.original: 組み立てたジオラマの 嘘だと
subtitles.english: As a lie of the assembled diorama

subtitles.original: 合わせづらい視点に 気づいている
subtitles.english: I'm aware of the point of view that's hard to align

subtitles.original: 描き出して行く未来を 美しさを
subtitles.english: The future that I'm drawing out, the beauty

subtitles.original: 手に
subtitles.english: In my hands

subtitles.original: それぞれが飛べる場所を 追いかけていく
subtitles.english: Chasing the places where each can fly

subtitles.original: この瞳は 鮮やかに 今 君しか映さない
subtitles.english: These eyes clearly reflect only you now

subtitles.original: 加速して初めて
subtitles.english: Only after accelerating
